commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** * The number of sub-categories to return (at most). * If the sub-categories are returned. *

* If Integer.MAX_VALUE is specified, all * sub-categories are returned. *

* Depending on the {@link #getResultMode() LimitsMode}, * this limit is applied globally or per results node. * In the global mode, if this limit is 3, * only 3 top results would be computed. * In the per-node mode, if this limit is 3, * 3 top children of {@link #getCategoryPath() the target category} would be returned, * as well as 3 top children of each of them, and so forth, until the depth defined * by {@link #getDepth()}. * @see #getResultMode() */ public final int getNumResults() { return numResults; }
commits.sourceOld:
